allUsers.description: Not documented, but I would guess it is similar to the 'usergroups.allUsers' property, which is described as: True if this group contains all users, otherwise false. Read-only.

creationTime.description: Not documented, but seems to be the creation time in milliseconds since epoch.

icon.description: Not documented, but looks like a base64 encoded image that is used as the icon for this organization in the GUI.

iconUrl.description: Not documented, but looks like an url for downloading the icon image

key.description: Not documented. It looked like a uuid in the organizations in ours testdata (but not the same value as the 'id' field).

id.description: The id of a instance of the 'organizationrole' datatype.
The id of a 'hubproject' instance that belongs to this organization.

projectsCount.description: The number of 'hubproject' instances that belong to this organization.
